title: Words Watchface
summary: Words watch face for Android Wear device with customizable backgrounds.
description: Words watch face for Android Wear devices.It changes between three backgrounds depends on the time: morning, sunset or night. Also you can choose between show and hide the date.Premium version lets you:- Create your own backgrounds with your images.- Change font colour.- Adjust time when background changes.- Select between two more new backgrounds.Compatible with square and rounded android wear watches.Tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and LG Watch.Check out our other watchfaces at: http://www.meronapps.com/nuestras-aplicaciones#portfolio
descriptionHTML:
Words watch face for Android Wear devices.
It changes between three backgrounds depends on the time: morning, sunset or night. Also you can choose between show and hide the date.

Premium version lets you:
- Create your own backgrounds with your images.
- Change font colour.
- Adjust time when background changes.
- Select between two more new backgrounds.

Compatible with square and rounded android wear watches.
Tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and LG Watch.
Check out our other watchfaces at: http://www.meronapps.com/nuestras-aplicaciones#portfolio
comments: Like it, But I would love more options. Colours, backgrounds, when the backgrounds change, etc.
Looks cool but the words are chopped off On a Moto 360. Would give 5 stars if it worked
More options and proper times Would be great if we could customize the size/location/look more. Also "ten two" (etc) is not a time... Please fix that
Terrific UI and functionality! It works just as I had hoped and looks great with a nice large notification. 24 hour clock support would make it perfect for me. Thanks for the app.
Not bad Would be much better if the date was there 2. Please add this asap.
I like the wording bit The cards do need to be a little shorter.
recentChanges: Updated to new Google watchface API
